website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy table that can hold up well until your child outgrows it.
pros: Comes with a large umbrella for shade
Does not take very long to put together
Natural colors look good in a yard
cons: The umbrella that comes with this table works well, but is not likely to last as long as the table itself

customer_reviews.title: Love this adorable table
customer_reviews.text: Love this table! So cute and matches the color scheme in our yard. We always get compliments from other parents when they are over. My daughter loves it! We spend a lot of time in the backyard and she uses it every day. Only con, wish the surface of the table was smooth and not ridged- makes it difficult to color/draw.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Welch

customer_reviews.title: but it also has recently worked nicely as a holiday table for the kids too
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves this. We used it outside for awhile and when the weather turned we popped the top (table and seats) off and brought it inside and put it back up. He uses it to color and playdoh on now and it cleans up well, but it also has recently worked nicely as a holiday table for the kids too.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great looking
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good looking picnic table for a small child. Took me about 15 minutes to assemble it. I do wish the screw installation was more traditional (defined holes that the screws easily go into) vs. this manufacturer's method of having you just poke a hole into the plastic. I am anal and want all the parts as close and tight as possible and their installation method doesn't guarantee that. Not a big enough deal to take away any stars though.
customer_reviews.author: Jules Davey

customer_reviews.title: This is such a good addition to my toddlers back yard adventures
customer_reviews.text: This is such a good addition to my toddlers back yard adventures. It should have easy together. But none of the holes are pre drilled so it was hard and time consuming to get it together. Other than that. No complaints and she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Mallorie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Table
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was collapsible and that I didn't need to use screws to put it together but I love the design so much more than the other more generic tables I've seen in Toys R Us...The benches are bigger which means more than 4 kids can sit down at once. I had 6 kids eating at this table including an 8 and 9 year old and it was not crowded at all. If putting it together was easier and if it was easier to store then I would definitely give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: L.A.

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute
customer_reviews.text: Even though our umbrella came with holes in it, i still love this product. It fits perfectly with our other Step2 play house. Its is a nice green and brown color. I was trying to avoid too many obnoxious colored items in the backyard (which comes with having kids and toys lol) . I have a 1 and 3 year old and I can see them using this for the next few years. I was also outside all summer and the green table top did not fade in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Love it..
customer_reviews.text: I love it but its a little effort to assemble and not to fond of the grooves on the table because it makes it hard to clean , also dont put drinks too close to the edge because the may fall...other than that it looks great, kids love it, the umbrealla is super cool and adjustable and my kids use it everyday..i have a 3 yr old, 4yr old, 6yr old, and 7 yr old and they all fit..
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt get if kids are older than 5.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions show a guy using a screwdriver to screw in the pieces. No way that was happening without a drill. Doesnt seem that sturdy either since you are drilling into plastic to keep the pieces together. Its also kind of small.
customer_reviews.author: Parent

customer_reviews.title: Cute kids picnic table
customer_reviews.text: Super cute kids picnic table w/umbrella...my toddler loves it. The only thing that could be improved upon is the scew placement: it was difficult to get drill in the nessesary position to drill in the screws on the underside of the table. But other than this, it was easy to put together and is quite sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Step2 Picnic Table
customer_reviews.text: We bought this picnic table for our daughter and it works well for her. She enjoys sitting and eating on the deck. It's easy for her to get on and off and the perfect size for her. As with any Step2 product, assembly is quick and easy. The only small issue is that there are no pilot holes for the few screws that need to be used, and time will tell whether those screws are adequate enough to hold. I always use an electric drill to get the screws through the initial part of the plastic, using care not to damage the table. It's an attractive picnic table and my daughter likes it, so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew A

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly
customer_reviews.text: It looks just as described, however the assembly directions are not in english. We were able to follow the pictures fortunately. But once assembled, it is extremely wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary B.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it and so do I!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great sturdy table. I love that it comes with a umbrella. Little toddle friendly. My daughter and niece love it. I move it around my yard because it is easy to move wherever my daughter likes to play.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Not fun to clean
customer_reviews.text: My husband had to add extra screws to make it more sturdy, and it’s a pain to clean. 😅 hosing it down outside would be ideal but we use it inside 🤷🏼‍♀️ I’d rather get something with a flat surface so it’s easier to clean after Art projects, eating, etc..
customer_reviews.author: Carter, Urban

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Folks you heard about super duper computer right. thats exactly what this is. super duper picnic table. i am recommending to amazon shopper. this has some amazing features that you won't find with other product. umbrella folds for storage. you can actually fill it with sand for more sturdiness. and do have a plug for center table when umbrella not in use. this is a WOW product. Don't waste time shopping around take my word for it. Tell you what i am picky and too picky when it comes to underwear and socks, so this was beyond that. what else can i tell you. Its awesome.
customer_reviews.author: BOMBAY prince

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: My son at the last minute asked for a picnic table for Christmas. I saw this one ordered it and received in time the box was all messed up, once it was set up we realized holes in the umbrella. The table is cute it’s just the umbrella had holes but I still have 5 stars because shipping is not the “products” fault.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly O.

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute patio table
customer_reviews.text: Have an 19 month old grandson and he loves sitting and playing and story telling on his new patio table. So happy I purchased this for him. I believe it will get a lot of use during the summer. It is very cute and love that it has an umbrella which helps a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Santa Maria, Ca.

customer_reviews.title: Great table for young and old.
customer_reviews.text: This rocks. It is awesome. I can sit at it with my great niece. She is two and I am 64. VERY study and the umbrella is really a nice touch. When we eat outside, we can put a couple of adults and kids at this table. I bought it on Prime Day and got a great deal, but would have happily paid full price now that I know how study and functional it is. Adds a nice touch to the patio, also.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Kay

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Super cute table. All fine and dandy when it’s assembled. But this is not easy to assemble at all. The directions are not very clear. And it tells you to screw screws into places where there are no holes. You need a drill. Not a screwdriver like the directions say. Luckily I have one, but be prepared to drill holes all over this piece, holes that are not very easy to drill because it’s very thick plastic.
customer_reviews.author: A Fontanez

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to assemble! Seems easy but the seats did not fit right. Cute but I wish there was a base for the umbrella and a tie to keep it closed. Ours blew away in a storm bc it opened and was pulled right out of the table (we even had the piece that supposed to hold it in place on there, still blew away)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda McGovern

customer_reviews.title: Great little table!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little picnic table at a great price! It was super easy to assemble (just a few screws) and it's nice and sturdy. My 3 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.author: P. R.

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I thought it would be. That's my bad. Kids love it. I had it in their room originally but they were using it to jump around the room like monkeys: bed to table to chair to bed.... so I moved it outside. Its durable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: JBowsher

customer_reviews.title: kids love it. Great for the backyard
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her new little table. She hangs out there with her friends when everyone is hanging out in the backyard. Not too hard to put together but a little imte consuming due to some of the angles ur required to put the screws in. They don't recommend to use a drill but it helped me out to go much quicker. Overall expected quality of this piece. I've also recommended this to friends with kids/toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seats 6!
customer_reviews.text: Love that this has seating for 6 kids. Perfect for when friends come over.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy310

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This may need to be reinforced with extra screws. The first time I moved it the top separated from the bottom. Also, the ages for this go too high. My 7 year old granddaughter is the 2nd shortest in her class at school and feels like she's too old for it. Maybe its just her though. She does fit fine. The umbrella is great in my sunny yard. The table is not too large for a 38" tall 3 year old. An almost 2 year old had a little trouble getting in the first time but quickly got the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: icnony

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: Have 3 grandsons that are under 5 and they can all fit comfortably at this table....Iam sure they will get a few more years out of it
customer_reviews.author: clarence

customer_reviews.title: Cool table. Good size
customer_reviews.text: Cool table. Good size. Works fir my 3 boys ages 2-7. However the "pre marked holes" to use just a screw driver to put it together was a no. Had to use a power screw driver. Pretty sturdy though.
customer_reviews.author: coffee-queen3

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this. They use it for their lunches, just to sit at and do art projects at. Very sturdy, super easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very long lasting and great looks
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 2 yr old. He loves it He is 5 now and still loves it. It has been outdoor all this time and it is still in great condition ( storm broke the unbrella) but table is still great.
customer_reviews.author: SukaLove8

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Longer to install than thought
customer_reviews.text: This table is great, but hard for single person to install. Had to screw and take out because of placement since no pre drilled holes. Otherwise sturdy and very nice for price. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Bogan

customer_reviews.title: Cute and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Husband hated setting it up. The bolts go in sideways. Easy to clean and sits many kids. Kids are obsessed with the umbrella lol
customer_reviews.author: Holly Ann

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this table and bench set. The benches are very flimsy if they are in the sun at all a 40 pound child will bend them to the point it looks like they’re about to break I would not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: D B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little kids
customer_reviews.text: My two daughters, 4&5 and my grandson 3 use this table. I was able to assemble it by myself without help. It's a great little table and we love the umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: calmer

customer_reviews.title: Great for many ages and seats for lots!
customer_reviews.text: A little more expensive than most of the tables, but it will last for so much longer (for kids as they grow) and seats more children. Love the design, it blends in outdoors on my patio and also looks great inside
customer_reviews.author: Susan U Seglem

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, functional, fun and pretty outdoor kid's table
customer_reviews.text: This table fits perfectly in my parent's backyard for my children (we live in NYC so our backyard in Central Park!). I love that it comes with a matching umbrella and colors of the table, chairs and umbrellas are neutral and can blend in a sophisticated backyard. We're big on encouraging our child to sit down at a table and eat meals. So this helps when we go to my parent's house to enjoy their pool and have BBQs! We also got the matching water table with umbrella and the set looks great together! I would definitely recommend this product. It's also a great price!
customer_reviews.author: MMI

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Useful!!!
customer_reviews.text: Since this is a picnic table there isn't a ton to say other than it looks good and seems durable so far. My three year old son fits perfectly and I expect will continue to for quite some time. The table looks great in the yard with the matching sand table I purchased. Both are wonderful and since these were bought together, Amazon gave a great discount and I couldn't be happier so far. Hope this helps. Also, the table is large enough for about 4 to 5 small children. You could fit 6 in a pinch (which would never happen at my house) but there wouldn't be elbow room for eating, playing, drawing... Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SAJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for summer days
customer_reviews.text: We love this product. My children are two and three and this fits them perfect with a little room to grow. The reason it did not get 5 stars is because of the top of the umbrella. It would come out too easy, easy enough for the two and three year old to pull it out multiple times to the point where we had to take the the umbrella out.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki McD

customer_reviews.title: Great table for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love eating their meals outside. I was looking for a table for them for some time and this one really stood out to me. The size is perfect for my 3 year old and 1.5 year old. They both sit under the umbrella out of the sun and eat lunch just about everyday (weather pending obviously!) The umbrella is removable for bad weather and can be used and various heights. Install was a breeze. I had it installed and ready for use in about 10 minutes. Its simply put together using screws. I highly recommend this table for anyone with kids!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Breyer

customer_reviews.title: Great item for children!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this along with the matching Sand and Water table for my three year old nephew. It came fast as usual with Amazon. He couldn't wait to put it together. The umbrella is also nice so you don't have to worry as much about the sun. Everyone was amazed at how fast it goes together as well as the size. He has a lot of cousins so this will come in handy when they have family over. I also like the quality of the table and I know he will have this for a long time and pass it on to his 1 month old brother.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena F.

customer_reviews.title: Kids table
customer_reviews.text: My child loves his table, took about 20 minutes to put together
customer_reviews.author: Adam Sieth

customer_reviews.title: Loved this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughters to have at my house. They loved it so much, they wanted one at their house, so MiMi bought two of them. The only gripe I have is that I paid $30 more for the 2nd one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken Box
customer_reviews.text: Received broken box hope all is ok since I’m giving as a gift
customer_reviews.author: I Unger

customer_reviews.title: Happy I Bought!
customer_reviews.text: This table is s nice sturdy table well suited for my grand children. They think the umbrella is fun and the parents like the extra sun protection. Good purchase and quality!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Fine

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: The great grandkids love this picnic table. It is very sturdy and cute and easy to put together and take apart. We took it on a family camp trip and all of the kids loved it. It seats 6 comfortably and was low enough that we were comfortable with the 11 month and 1 year olds sitting at it. Adults can sit on the 4 corners where there is support.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 2 year old. Easy to assemble and sturdy. Worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece (2 yo) and nephew (1 yo). My sister loves it! She said it is the perfect size for the kids, easy to clean, and great for lunch time outside. She's happy with the gift, so I'm happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: RNag

customer_reviews.title: enjoying this table
customer_reviews.text: So far we really like this picnic table/umbrella set. My 22 month old loves sitting at it and I like that it has the umbrella. It was really easy to put together, but as other reviews said, the table top is textured so you would need to put something underneath a paper to color on it. I knew that when I bought it though, so that's why I still give it 5 stars. The only thing I would say contrary to another review is that a smaller adult can sit on the supported end of one of the benches, however, it is not a comfortable fit. Overall, great product, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: JenB

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Our oldest grandkids have had one for six years and still in good shape. So of course we ordered for other younger grandkids
customer_reviews.author: PGB

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it . Sunday family nights are great for the kids they feel they have their own big kids table . Great for finger painting as it is easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my great grandchildren and they loved it and will be able to have it for several years. They are one and four.
customer_reviews.author: T H

customer_reviews.title: Great, reasonably-priced
customer_reviews.text: Great, reasonably-priced, very sturdy and colorful table. Perfect for my needs. Agree with other commenters who remarked that the tabletop has grooves in it that try to imitate "real" wood (except that a real wood top would not have the ridges or depth of grain that this tabletop has). In spite of this however, it is a great table.
customer_reviews.author: KPec

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful- our grandchildren automatically find a seat and eat. No walking around the house with food. Wonderful for craft projects too.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Neuhaus

customer_reviews.title: Good table for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two-year-old nephews. They really liked it. I would have liked to have had some whole pre-drilled for the crews as that would have made putting the table together much easier. I would definitely recommend using an electric/battery operated screwdriver or drill.
customer_reviews.author: Miasmomtracie

customer_reviews.title: Worst assembly ever
customer_reviews.text: Wosrt assembly ever! First it never came with directions. And now half the screws won't in the table. Very disappointed in assembly but everything else love the table.
customer_reviews.author: Momoftwins

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was foldable, but it's good. It holds a good amount of weight.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Cute table!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute table and is pretty good quality. My only complaint is that it is difficult to clean because of all the grooves in the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great size picnic table
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my great nephews ages 2 and 3. It is the right size now and they will be able to use it for years because of the stability/durability of it.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Washington

customer_reviews.title: This product is awesome for the age group specified.
customer_reviews.text: I truly just love it and my son lives in Calif and its great to good a good product shipped to them from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Price - GREAT Product
customer_reviews.text: A Must Have helps keep the kids outside eating lunch on the deck or if we put in the back yard. Easy clean up of crumbs and crackers from our 3 girls. Very sturdy, easy to put together have had almost a year now and still one of the best buys we have ever made lol. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Boo Parry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Still going strong after 3 years of abuse by now, 3, children!
customer_reviews.author: SandyBT

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I purchased this table and umbrella. It is so cute and looks so good out or inside the house. I am so glad step 2 has improved on the colors they offer and I no longer have a florescent orange and yellow picnic table uglifying my decor. This is very classy and roomy and will indeed fit 6 children with regular sized plates. The umbrella is very nice as well and shades the table extremely well. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jill S

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Table!
customer_reviews.text: This table was super easy to assemble. You will need a power drill. The kids love it and I love that they now have their own table to sit at when we are all hanging out back as a family.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my three little ones.
customer_reviews.text: I have 6-, 5-, and 3 1/2- year -old grandchildren and this table fits them perfectly. They love it, and I think the umbrella is great. It covers them for their picnics, and it looks very nice in the yard, much better than the one I had for their Momma. It seems to be of a heavier construction than the old one, which lasted for years; I have high hopes for this one, too.
customer_reviews.author: L Wise

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: She loves it Granddaughter used it everyday Timely shipping, arrived in good condition
customer_reviews.author: Amy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love this table!
customer_reviews.text: The table is sturdy for my 2 year old granddaughter and a 4 1/2 year old friend. We have the table on our deck so we haven't used the umbrella. Everything went together reasonably well. I put it together by myself with hand tools. It would have been faster and easier had I used my husband's power screwdriver. Great purchase at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Lunch for the Crew!
customer_reviews.text: Lunch for the crew! I have it just outside patio door so they can eat outside. I pass them snack or lunch to have on the picnic table. Very sturdy and easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Kassie

customer_reviews.title: Let's have fun... In the sun
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love this! The material is high grade , very thick plastic, I look for them to play on it for many years to come . The umbrella looks just one from a beach.....
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our grandsons. They can use it on the deck or in the yard. Colorful and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Good table
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and it fits my boys (ages 3 and 5) well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Johnston

customer_reviews.title: everything I hoped
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit nervous about ordering a birthday gift and having it shipped across country in case the quality wasnt there. Well, this did not disappoint and as another reviewer mentioned, the umbrella was very high quality and great for boys or girls. The entire unit blended well with the background of the woods.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri L Reno

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old granddaughter loved this. And her older brother fit well on ...
customer_reviews.text: 5 year old granddaughter loved this. And her older brother fit well on the opposite side.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this table for my Grandkids. It was so easy to put together and when my granddaughter entered the back yard and saw it she was thrilled. She sat at the table a good part of the day, drawing and coloring. My grandson also loves to sit next to his sister and they are both very comfortable. I love Step 2 products.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pizzo

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece to add to our deck
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece to add to our deck, but I ended up with very sore arms after trying to use an electric screwdriver to put the screws through this plastic. What a nightmare! My husband ended up having to take a turn putting this together because I was hurting.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Winfrey Ventura

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i expected.
customer_reviews.text: Great for my 2 kids under 6 yrs old. They use it everyday at their yard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made.
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute, I have the matching sandbox , my daughter loves it. Nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the directions are a bit fluky but the product is lovely I have two for my childcare center and the kids love
customer_reviews.text: a little tricky to assemble, the directions are a bit fluky but the product is lovely I have two for my childcare center and the kids love them
customer_reviews.author: Estarovia

customer_reviews.title: This was a great value and it's a very sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: This was a great value and it's a very sturdy product. It looks nice. Not like the little tikes bold colors. It actually looks nice on my deck.
customer_reviews.author: Kdamms3

customer_reviews.title: Great table!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for my great-grand-daughters. The two and a half year old has her's on the family deck near the breakfast room door and eats her meals at her new table when the weather is warm enough. She loves her table and it looks nice too. The four year old does the same. Great products for this age group. Would recommend this product. If space is available, it could be used indoors without the umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Zetha V. Ballinger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent beyond measure!
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best and I would recommend dealing directly with Amazon always. After a complete fiasco with another company, Amazon came thru with this. My son-in-law put it together in less than 20 minutes and the boys loved it!! I am so happy!! Thank you Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Marilee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my granddaughter and very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra P.

customer_reviews.title: DURABILITY
customer_reviews.text: GOT THIS TABLE AND UMBRELLA FOR GRANDKIDS. UMBRELLA CAME WITH DAMAGE TO THE METAL SUPPORT PIECES. TABLE WAS DIFFICULT TO ASSEMBLE WITH HARDWARE. NOT REAL PLEASED WITH PRODUCT. DID NOT RETURN TO AMAZON BECAUSE WOULD BE TOO DIFFICULT TO REPACKAGE ALL PIECES.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Cute table needs improvements.
customer_reviews.text: I got this Table in the mail and it took my husband about 15 minutes to set up. I love the Nature looking colors and it blends in better with our yard. However the bench bends in the middle if more then 2 kids sit on the bench. It's cute but I would like to see the seats a little bit more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the shipping and delivery of this item. Nothing damaged/bent. Table could be a little more solid, but appears that for our purposes (with 4 kids using it), it does the job. Only had it for a few weeks, so cannot comment on the long-term durability. Easily seats the 4 kids, ages 8 down to 3.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca U.

customer_reviews.title: Nice table with a great umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and sturdy. Wanted a table with an umbrella for a sunny yard. The umbrella for this table is a good size to provide good shade. It is a perfect size for 6 children to sit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: nonnakjj

customer_reviews.title: I wish the company who made the product would label the parts better; and drill the hole better
customer_reviews.text: I loveeeee the product! !! My 14 mos old daughter loves it too! I wish the company who made the product would label the parts better; and drill the hole better. Overall, no regrets! :)
customer_reviews.author: sisavanh

customer_reviews.title: Nice table for kids
customer_reviews.text: Perfect table for my toddler and her friends. We just had a birthday party and 5 kids used this table to eat lunch together. The umbrella is nice when its sunny. The seats get a little warm in the summer, sometimes we have to put a towel down on them.
customer_reviews.author: Janeen

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: The grandchildren love this! It IS etched on the top, so not smooth, as other reviewers have stated. Oh well. However, it didn't stay together, so we had to drill the holes a bit & use our own screws. Be aware of this and take care of it b/f children sit.
customer_reviews.author: granny

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic kid table
customer_reviews.text: I got this table for my 18 month old and 2 1/2yr old as they hate their high chairs. The table is awesome for all their activities and lunch and dinner time and is easy to clean with warm soapy water and a scrubbing pad. Good for indoor and outdoor use. This was the cheapest place I found for this table too!!!! Bonus! And it arrived days earlier than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Aussie

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: This table is absolutely adorable and functional. Very sturdy and well made It will last forever! The umbrella is so nice and well made not flimsy at all very good quality. The umbrella is very big creates shade around the entire table perfect for my kids to have lunch outside they loved it looks great with the rest of my outdoor decor. The price is amazing I recommend this table 100% easy to clean wipe down and done fits 6 kids comfortably very happy with this table!
customer_reviews.author: Shwani

customer_reviews.title: Awesome table, but the package came entirely opened.
customer_reviews.text: The table itself is awesome, assembly is moderate but my package came opened. I'm not entirely sure if that's the fault of the manufacturer or carrier, but that's my only complaint
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Great little table!
customer_reviews.text: Is very sturdy and it looks nice too! Is super easy to put together, only a matter of minutes. Is nice heavy plastic and has a good solid base and does not wobble. Kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: JaredT

customer_reviews.title: Best kids table!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a few of these and some where hard to assemble and others not sturdy enough but this one was So easy to put together! My daughter loves it and it fits 4 kids comfortably
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Pico

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table set for kiddos. Our 2 and 5 year olds eat lunch at it every day in the summer. It accommodates 6 toddlers and about 4 pre-schooler/kids. Sturdy and the umbrella is wonderful. Be sure to take the umbrella down in the rain, however.
customer_reviews.author: LTK

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I’m more than annoyed! There are no holes for the screws. This is extremely difficult to put together.!!!
customer_reviews.author: steph menditto

customer_reviews.title: Step 2 picnic table
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my granddaughter first birthday and she is going to be so excited I know I'm. It is very well made and I expect her to get many years with this
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, looks great and is very sturdy. My daughter was delighted to sit at it, and asks to eat at it all the time. Also like that it has a matching slide and sand and water table you can purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love this picnic table
customer_reviews.text: We love this picnic table! Easily seats 6, and sometimes my kids also pull their child sized chairs up to the ends. Great design and color. Umbrella is a nice touch too!
customer_reviews.author: Hillary K.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Big
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, sturdy picnic table. My granddaughter is 3 and it will probably be with her for another 3 years. Now 6 small children can fit at the table. The umbrella can be disassembled and stored. It is much better than the "other" brand that is popular!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble, lightweight, and has plenty of room for 6 kids.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey G. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great little table.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table for my 2 year old nephew's birthday present. He absolutely loves it. It was easy to assemble. The colors compliment any outdoor décor. It is very sturdy and he'll use it for years.
customer_reviews.author: Deb4u

customer_reviews.title: really enjoy
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter is thrill about it. Really, really enjoy it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Step2 Naturally Playful Picnic Table with Umbrella
product_meta.description:
Picnic table with umbrella

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Step2 Naturally Playful Picnic Table with Umbrella is a classic style with a pleasant design that fits into all types of backyards.
feature_bullets: Features a large and easy to clean table top
Umbrella Blocks 97.5% of UVA and UVB rays (UPF rating of 40+)
Perfect for indoor or outdoor use
